amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 2 of the bill which would amend the Clean Air Act to force emissions from any offshore source to be measured only at the corresponding onshore location.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 112-111 to strike section 2 of H.R. 2021.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 248 (Roll no. 467).
